Name: EARTH POSTLANDING
checklistText:
POSTLANDING

		POSTLANDING STABILIZATON

Panel 229:
		cb MN REL (2) - close

Panel 2:
		MN REL - on (up)



		xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
		x				x
		  If no mn chute rel
Panel 1:
			ELS AUTO - AUTO (verify)


			ELS LOGIC - on (up) (verify)
Panel 2:
			MN REL - on (up)
		x				x
		xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx



			WARNING

		If fire or smoke after impact,
		refer to Fire/Smoke in CM
		During Postlanding

Panel 8:
		SECS PYRO ARM (2) - SAFE
		SECS LOGIC (both) - OFF

		If not in contact with recovery forces

Panel 9, 10, 6:
		VHF AM (3) - RCV

Panel 3:
		VHF AM A - off (ctr)
		VHF AM RCV - A

Panel 8:
		cb PL VENT FLT/PL - close
		cb FLOAT BAG (all) - close

Panel 278:
		cb UPR SYS COMPR (both) - close
		If floating upright


			CAUTION

		Wait 10 min prior to init bag fill.
		This allows the ablator to cool
		sufficiently prior to inflation.
		Heat can destroy bags.

Panel 8:
		FLOAT BAG (all) - FILL for 7 min,
			then OFF


		xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
		x					x
		  If floating inverted
			FLOAT BAG (all) - FILL

Panel 3:
			VHF BCN - OFF
			VHF AM A - off (ctr)

		  Two min after upright

Panel 8:
			FLOAT BAG (all) - OFF

Panel 3:
			VHF BCN - ON


		  If in contact with recovery forces
			prior to floating inverted
				VHF AM A - SIMPLEX


		  If CM fails to upright in 7 min
			&
		  CM rolls CW

Panel 8:
			FLOAT BAG 2 R - OFF
			(Continue uprighting for 8
				additional min)

		If uprighting does not occur in
			3 min, reposition to area behind
			CDR's couch & CMP's couch as
			near as poss to B3 stowage
			locker

		or	CM rolls CCW
			FLOAT BAG 1 L - OFF
			(Continue uprighting for 8
			additional min)

		If uprighting does not occur in
			3 min, reposition to area
			behind LMP's couch & CMP's couch

		or	No roll
			FLOAT BAG 3 CTR - OFF
			(Continue uprighting for 8
				additional min)


		If uprighting does not occur in
			3 min, reposition to area
			on top of or along lower
			equip bay cstr



				WARNING

			If CM still does not upright,
			prepare to egress within
			15 min (because of environ-
			mental conditions) after
			completing above uprighting
			procedure. Refer to Stable II
			Water Egress Procedure

		x						x
		xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx


		

			POST STABILIZATION AND VENTILATION

		Release footstraps
		Release restraint harness

Panel 275:
		cb MNA BAT BUS A & BAT C (2) - open
		cb MNB BAT BUS B & BAT C (2) - open
		cb FLT/PL BAT C - open

Panel 250:
		cb PYRO A/SEQ A - open
		cb PYRO B/SEQ B - open

Panel 3:
		DC IND sel - BAT BUS A,B
			DC VOLTS ind - >27.5 vdc


		xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
		x						  x
		  If BAT BUS A(B) <27.5 vdc

Panel 275:
			cb FLT/PL BAT BUS A(B) - open
			Go to Comm Low Pwr Procedures

		  If BAT BUS A & B (2) <27.5 vdc
			cb FLT/PL BAT BUS A & B (2) - open
			cb FLT/PL BAT C - close
			Go to Comm Low Pwr Procedures

		x						  x
		xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx


		PLV distribution duct (3) - unstow
			& install
		Remove debris trap from left
			X-X head strut at MDC

Panel 2:
		PL VENT VLV - PULL (unlock)

Panel 15:
		PL VENT - HI or LO






		xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
		x				      x
		  If no PLV operation
			To initially open vlvs

Panel 376:
				PLVC sw - OPEN
			To close vlvs

Panel 15:
				PL VENT - OFF
			To reopen vlvs
				PL VENT - HI or LO
		x				      x
		xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

		PL BCN LT - LO

		xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
		x				      x
		  If no flashing lt

Panel 8:
			FLOOD FIXED - POST LDG
				for 1/2 min
				OFF for 1/2 min
		x				      x
		xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

		Deploy dye marker & swimmer umbilical

Panel 15:
			DYE MARKER - on (up)

Panel 9,10,6:
		INTERCOM (3) - T/R (verify)


		Deploy line grappling hook (if req)
			CAB PRESS DUMP vlv - remove
			Grappling hook & line - deploy
				thru vlv opening
			Cover plate - secure


 



			POSTLANDING COMMUNICATIONS

			Normal Postlanding Communications

Panel 3:
			VHF BCN - ON (verify)
			VHF ANT - RECY (verify)


		If no contact with recovery forces
			VHF AM B - SIMPLEX
			Mon for VHF bcn 1000 Hz tone
				(2 sec on,  sec off)
			VHF AM B - off (ctr)
			If VHF bcn not audible
				Remove survival transceiver from
					stowage & mount ant
				Sel VOICE on transceiver
				Mon VHF bcn for 1000 Hz tone
					(2 sec on, 3 sec off)
				If VHF bcn operating
					Turn off survival transceiver
					Stow transceiver in RHFEB


		xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
		x					   x
		  If no VHF bcn sig, turn off
			transceiver, remove ant, & conn
			tranceiver to ant per "Survival
			Transceiver Communications"
		  Sel BCN on transceiver
		  Mon VHF AM for comm initiated by
			recovery aircraft
		x					   x
		xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
		  




				Survival Transceiver Communications

Panel 3:
		VHF BCN - OFF (if no contact after
			24 hours)
		Survival transceiver - conn to VHF
			BCN ant cable
				Remove survival transceiver from
					stowage
				Unlatch & open VHF ant access door



				Disconnect P112 conn from bcn
	
				Attach transceiver cable P1 conn to
					tranceiver (verify)
				Conn transceiver cable J1 conn to
					P112 conn
				Select BCN on transceiver


			
				Communications Low Power Procedures

		VHF BCN - OFF

Panel 8:
		FLOOD FIXED - OFF

Panel 3:
		VHF AM A - off (ctr)
		VHF AM RCV - A
		PL VENT sys - minimize use
		Survival transceiver - conn to VHF
			BCN ant cable (refer to Survival
			Transceiver Comm)

				

				Spacecraft Power Down

Panel 15:
		PL VENT - OFF

Panel 250:
		cb ENTRY/PL BAT A, B, C (3) - open
